content: If you drive at a constant speed of 55 miles per hour for 4.5 hours, how far will you travel?

If I drive at a constant speed of 55 miles per hour for 4.5 hours, the distance I will travel can be calculated using the formula:

Distance = Speed × Time

So, plugging in the values:

Distance = 55 mph × 4.5 hours = 247.5 miles

Therefore, I will travel 247.5 miles.
